author: barnabasbusa
content:
Labelling was incorrect due to a shift of 150 deposits that were done post genesis (and before we made the prysm deposits). So there was a shift of 150 validator indices after 2700. 
Apologies for the confusion, it should be resolved now. We haven't detected it before, as we didn't have external deposits done in previous devnets.
